address: Xã Húc, Huyện Hướng Hóa, Tỉnh Quảng Trị
thought:
**Finding the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Húc"**

Okay, so I need to figure out the current administrative unit for "Xã Húc, Huyện Hướng Hóa, Tỉnh Quảng Trị."  First, I'm going to confirm the province is still "Tỉnh Quảng Trị."  Checking resolution 60-NQ/TW, Quảng Trị isn't slated for any major changes or mergers, other than the past one with Quảng Bình, so that checks out.

Now, the crucial step is finding any resolutions specifically regarding "Tỉnh Quảng Trị" and its lower administrative levels. I immediately jump to 1680/NQ-UBTVQH15. I'm searching for "Xã Húc" and BOOM, line 54 is the golden ticket! It explicitly states that "Xã Húc" is being merged into a new unit named "Xã Khe Sanh." This means "Xã Húc" no longer exists as a separate entity.

To solidify this, I'm cross-referencing this finding with my "New Wards" list. I'm looking for "Xã Khe Sanh" within "Tỉnh Quảng Trị."  And there it is! A perfect match: ward code 19429, ward name "Xã Khe Sanh", and province name "Tỉnh Quảng Trị."

Given the explicit nature of the resolution and the corroboration from the new wards list, I have high confidence in this result. Therefore, the new ward is "Xã Khe Sanh" with a ward code of 19429.  My citation is 1680/NQ-UBTVQH15, specifically line 54.  It's a clear-cut case. I will now construct the appropriate JSON output based on these findings.

citation.header: 1680/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Quảng Trị
citation.line: 54. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Khe Sanh vàcác xã Tân Hợp, Húc,Hướng Tân thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Khe Sanh**.
